Texts.Chs: 优秀。现在我再也不用冒着严寒了！就像我保证过的，来，这是你应得的^orange;酬劳^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Excellent. Now I can really cut my teeth on exploring this frozen hell. As promised: ^orange;your payment^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 简述：我需要更好的装备以应付外面的寒冷气候，^orange;超致密头盔^orange;是最适合的，请带一个给我。我不会让你白干的。
Texts.Eng: Simply put: I need better protection for the cold outside. A ^orange;Densinium Helm^orange; would be perfect. I would handsomely compensate you for the materials.
